Add labels to biomarkers

Source: R/add_labels.R
add_labels.Rd

Add labels to biomarkers

Usage

add_labels(data)

Arguments

data

a data.frame containing the relevant columns

Value

a modified version of data with var labels added

Examples

test_data |> add_labels()
#> # A tibble: 687 × 430
